description.en: A compiler-driven JavaScript framework for building high-performance user interfaces.
description.zh: 一个编译器驱动的 JavaScript 框架，旨在构建高性能用户界面。

highPerformanceDescription.en: Deeply optimized compiler output, combined with an efficient reactive system using Signals, delivers native-like smoothness.
highPerformanceDescription.zh: 深度优化的编译器与高效的 Signals 响应式系统协同工作，带来原生般流畅体验。

fullTypeSafetyDescription.en: Built-in TypeScript support ensures end-to-end type checking across development and build, improving code reliability.
fullTypeSafetyDescription.zh: 内置 TypeScript 支持，提供从开发到构建的端到端类型检查，确保代码高度可靠。

fastDevelopmentDescription.en: Powered by Vite for millisecond-level hot updates and efficient bundling, boosting development productivity.
fastDevelopmentDescription.zh: 借助 Vite 驱动，实现毫秒级热更新与高效打包，从而提升开发效率。

easyToLearnDescription.en: Familiar API design inspired by mainstream frameworks lowers the learning curve and speeds up proficiency.
easyToLearnDescription.zh: 采用主流框架风格的 API 设计，可降低学习难度，助力开发者快速上手。
